alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Burlington; Cape May; Cumberland; Mercer; Middlesex; Monmouth; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:15PM EDT until June 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Atlantic County in southern New Jersey... Southeastern Cumberland County in southern New Jersey... Ocean County in southern New Jersey... Southeastern Mercer County in central New Jersey... Northern Cape May County in southern New Jersey... Eastern Burlington County in southern New Jersey... Monmouth County in central New Jersey... South central Middlesex County in northern New Jersey... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 115 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Roosevelt to Old Halfway to near Estell Manor, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Toms River, Atlantic City, Long Branch, Asbury Park, Ocean City, Lakewood, Jackson, Howell, Manalapan, Barnegat, Pleasantville, Tinton Falls, Hammonton, Beachwood, Somers Point, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon and Margate City. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 8 and 8A. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 6 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 20 and 109. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Burlington; Cape May; Cumberland; Mercer; Middlesex; Monmouth; Ocean
